complaint.classification: Lack of Internet Experience in Internet Industry
complaint.description: Purchased Cell C Internet ZTE modem/router with promise that it will deliver reception to stream. Can only obtain between 0.75 and 3.6mbps! Claim it transmits up to 90 Mbps! Their seems to be no expertise in South Africa to offer support only Robots. Where does one find assistance as we experienced similar problems with Fibre installers and ISPs.
complaint.suggestion: Provide better support and expertise for customers experiencing internet speed issues. Improve communication and assistance channels to address customer concerns.
